sentence: But despite the missing call records, the Jan. 6 committee has reportedly unearthed information on at least one of Trump’s most highly scrutinized calls: A call between him and Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH).
author: Cristina Cabrera
title: Report: Jan. 6 Panel Finds Holes In Trump’s Official Call Logs On Day Of Insurrection

sentence: "I mean, I talked to Kevin McCarthy, I have talked to Jim Jordan and I have talked to other members who were speaking to the president, the former president that day," he reported.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Here's why Trump may be headed for a 'criminal referral'

sentence: The Texas Republican senator posted two images of himself at Mar-a-Lago He's in Florida to speak at the Conservative Political Action Conference Thurs Trump was hosting a fundraiser for 2022 GOP congressional candidates Cruz moderated a chat with Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker Tennessee House candidate Morgan Ortagus was also there, along with former Florida AG Pam Bondi, Florida Rep. Mike Waltz and Ohio Rep. title: Trump meets Ted Cruz at Mar-a-Lago ahead of C-PAC: Republicans and conservative donors mingle at private Florida private club ahead of ex-President's prime-time Saturday night speech
